channel.title: Not an error but explain this@?!?!?!
channel.description: ok so me and my brother ( on two different computers ) are on mopar and we find a server we like...it lets one of us log in but the other computer will say " server must be down" or "no response from server"....why!?

item.title: Not an error but explain this@?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @cahhillbuddy cahhillbuddy
item.description:
@cahhillbuddy wrote:

at the same time doesnt work… lol new server…any1 kno a good one?

Read full topic

item.title: Not an error but explain this@?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Click Login ~ the same time; then BAM your both in.

Read full topic
item.source: Not an error but explain this@?!?!?!

item.title: Not an error but explain this@?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You are connecting from the same IP address, so the server you are connecting to must only allow one connection per IP, which is a bad policy. All you can do besides talk to the server owner, is pick another server.

Read full topic
item.source: Not an error but explain this@?!?!?!

item.title: Not an error but explain this@?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“cahhillbuddy, post:1, topic:349231”]ok so me and my brother ( on two different computers ) are on mopar and we find a server we like…it lets one of us log in but the other computer will say " server must be down" or “no response from server”…why!?[/quote]I’m not sure how your connection works, but if you’re connecting from the same IP address then they might not allow more than one connection per IP on their server.

Read full topic
